__e: Dale's out today. You collect carts!
- Get on those wagons, I tell you.
Those wagons back in Savannah, they were only letting on the healthy and the young... and they weren't going to a new camp.
And now for the favor I'm going to ask you.
As you go in, we'll come out from the wagons and meet you.
It's in the wagons and they're safe.
- All the wagons are ready. We can leave.
What happens when they discover the armoured cars are missing?
- Wait till those cars get to New York.
